sentences.en: American companies are keen to scout out business opportunities in Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 美国公司很想在越南寻找商机。

sentences.en: Football scout Francis Corneo spotted Diego's talent.
sentences.cn: 球探弗朗西斯-科尼奥发现了迭戈的天才.

sentences.en: He had a scout round to see what he could find.
sentences.cn: 他四处搜寻看看能找到些什么.

sentences.en: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
sentences.cn: 他派出三名侦察兵到前面侦察大桥的情况。

sentences.en: He was mistaken for an enemy scout and badly wounded.
sentences.cn: 他被误认为是敌人的侦察兵,受了重伤.

sentences.en: He wore the garb of a scout, not a general.
sentences.cn: 他身着童子军制服，而不是将军的制服。

sentences.en: I wouldn't have time to scout the area for junk.
sentences.cn: 我没空在这个地区找没用的东西。

sentences.en: I'll ask Mary to help. She's a good scout.
sentences.cn: 我会请玛丽帮忙, 她是个好人.
喷气式战斗机在空中侦察巡逻.

sentences.en: No one felt more strongly about it than my scout.
sentences.cn: 对这件事情反应最强烈的是我的校工.

sentences.en: The commander sent a party to scout out a safer area.
sentences.cn: 指挥官派出一支小队去寻找更为安全的地区.

sentences.en: The scout made a stealthy approach to the enemy position.
sentences.cn: 侦察兵偷偷地靠近敌军阵地.

sentences.en: The scout opposed his arm to the blow of the enemy soldier.
sentences.cn: 侦察兵用手臂挡住敌兵的打击.

sentences.en: The scout scratched a map in the dirt with a stick.
sentences.cn: 侦察员在地上用棍子粗略地画出了一幅地图.

sentences.en: The scout single - handedly penetrated behind the enemy's rear lines.
sentences.cn: 侦察员 单枪匹马 深入敌后.

sentences.en: The scout was sent to spy out the land.
sentences.cn: 侦探被派出去秘密侦察高地去了.

sentences.en: They scouted the area for somewhere to stay the night.
sentences.cn: 他们四处查看，想找个过夜的地方。

words.tran_cn: 童子军的活动；初步勘探；搜索活动
侦察，刺探；寻找；物色（人才等）（scout的ing形式）
搜索，[航][军]侦察；侦察员；侦察机

phrases.tran_cn: n. 童子军；过于理想而不切实际者；单纯的政治家

trans.tran_cn: 搜索，侦察，侦察员， 侦察机， 侦察舰 , 童子军，（牛津大学的）校工
trans.tran_en: a soldier, plane etc that is sent to search the area in front of an army and get information about the enemy
to look for something in a particular area
to examine a place or area in order to get information about it
